name: Desert Assault
description:
You have to shoot down enemies in the desert. Have 3 lifes, don't let them pass you or will loose a life. Your gun has a cooldown so you can't shoot repeatedly. After take down 50 enemies the boss will come and needs 30 shoots to kill it.

Controls: 

A/D - Move vehicle

up/down arrows - Rotate gun

Space Bar - Shoot

Close game - ALT+F4 ;)
